title: Table 167 - Row 8
clause_text: 10.: 14. | Whether area for inclusive housing is required as per Regulation No.3.8 ? Please state the details.: (b) Is / are room(s) dependent for its light and ventilation on the chowk ? If so, are the dimensions of the chowk as required ?

headers: Whether area for inclusive housing is required as per Regulation No.3.8 ? Please state the details.
values: (b) Is / are room(s) dependent for its light and ventilation on the chowk ? If so, are the dimensions of the chowk as required ?
